caption:
In the photograph, a diverse group of people are engaged in browsing and selecting books at what appears to be an outdoor book stall. The setting suggests a lively public space, possibly a street or an open market area. The time period indicated by the clothing styles and haircuts might be somewhere around the 1960s or 1970s.

The image captures a moment of active engagement with literature, where individuals of various ages and styles are closely inspecting books. Most of the people pictured are wearing sunglasses and daywear appropriate for an outdoor setting. The clothing includes items like blazers, dresses, and casual shirts, indicating a range of personal styles.

The composition depicts some people standing while perusing through books laid out on a table that are mostly in the shade, highlighting their concentration and the ambient outdoor lighting. There is a sense of casualness and community as these individuals share the common interest of reading.

In the background, signs of urban life and additional people hint at a busy city environment, enhancing the sense of a communal, public gathering centered around the pleasure of reading and acquiring books. The focus on books and the act of reading links everyone in the scene despite their diverse appearances and dress styles.
title: Fountain square in downtown Cincinnati is a public square that works for the city and its people in a myriad of ways: sale of donated books for benefit of Cincinnati and hamilton public library
